channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023090920
item.description:
Report X-2023090920

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-16
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING NITRIC ACID WAS FOUND WITH TWO OF THE BOTTLES COMPLETELY LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE DISPOSED OF UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO IMPROPER HANDLING WHILE BEING REMOVED FROM THE BELT CAUSING 2 BOTTLE OF NITRIC ACID TO BE COMPLETED LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023090864
item.description:
Report X-2023090864

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: EAST BRUNSWICK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: One gallon jug punctured at 10AM. Ops Mgr Thomas Jacob reported a hazmat damage in unload at door 18. Outer packaging is wet. 1 gallon of ethanol solution leaked outside of the box on to remaining content DescribePack: One gallon jug punctured DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed with QA for processing.

item.title: Report E-2023100350
item.description:
Report E-2023100350

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: CARLSTADT
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 55 gallon drum of n-butyl methacrylate (un2227) releasing 1 pint of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report I-2023060016
item.description:
Report I-2023060016

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-02
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Customer seat 9G dropped her mobile phone inside/under seat and then reclined her seat When her seat was reclined it crushed her mobile phone and her phone began smoking Customers phone was placed in TCB and contained issue onboard No injuries reported.
